import React, { useRef, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from 'axios' const MusicList = ({ musicList, handleTitleClick, handlePlay, handlePause, isPlaying, src, authUser }) => { const handleAddToFavorite = (file, title, artist) => { console.log(authUser, file, title, artist) axios.post('http://localhost:5000/music/add', { authUser, file, title, artist }) .then(res => { console.log(res) }) .catch(err => console.log(err)); } return (
#
Title
Artist
{musicList.map(({ file, title, artist, duration, rawDuration }, key) => ( src === 'http://localhost:5000/music/' + file ?
{ handleTitleClick(file, key, duration, rawDuration) }}>
{key}
{title}
{artist}
{duration}
{!((src === 'http://localhost:5000/music/' + file) && (isPlaying.playing)) ? { handlePlay(file, key, duration, rawDuration) }} className="far fa-play-circle fa-2x"> : { handlePause() }} className="far fa-pause-circle fa-2x "> }
{ handleAddToFavorite(file, title, artist) }}>
:
{ handleTitleClick(file, key, duration, rawDuration) }}>
{key}
{title}
{artist}
{duration}
{!((src === 'http://localhost:5000/music/' + file) && (isPlaying.playing)) ? { handlePlay(file, key, duration, rawDuration) }} className="far fa-play-circle fa-2x"> : { handlePause() }} className="far fa-pause-circle fa-2x "> }
{ handleAddToFavorite(file, title, artist) }}>
)) }
) } export default MusicList;
